mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.people_id AS "peopleId", a.economic AS "economic", a.allowance AS "allowance", a.guar_iden AS "guarIden", a.guar_name AS "guarName", a.guar_tel AS "guarTel", a.dateonset AS "dateonset", a.diag_type AS "diagType", a.atte_type AS "atteType", a.acci_hist AS "acciHist", a.acci_count AS "acciCount", a.acci_last AS "acciLast", a.dang_asse AS "dangAsse", a.trea_cond AS "treaCond", a.hospital AS "hospital", a.hosp_reason AS "hospReason", a.trai_inst AS "traiInst", a.management AS "management", a.helpcase AS "helpcase", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

a.id AS "id", a.people_id AS "peopleId", a.economic AS "economic", a.allowance AS "allowance", a.guar_iden AS "guarIden", a.guar_name AS "guarName", a.guar_tel AS "guarTel", a.dateonset AS "dateonset", a.diag_type AS "diagType", a.atte_type AS "atteType", a.acci_hist AS "acciHist", a.acci_count AS "acciCount", a.acci_last AS "acciLast", a.dang_asse AS "dangAsse", a.trea_cond AS "treaCond", a.hospital AS "hospital", a.hosp_reason AS "hospReason", a.trai_inst AS "traiInst", a.management AS "management", a.helpcase AS "helpcase", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.ident AS "ident", b. NAME AS "name", b.sex AS "sex", b.telephone AS "telephone", b.type AS "type", b.censu AS "censu", b.domiciledetail AS "domiciledetail", b.residencedetail AS "residencedetail", b.images AS "images", b.birthday AS "birthday", a20.name AS "comName", (case a.atte_type when 01 then '高' when 02 then '中' when 03 then '低' else '' end) "atteTypeLable"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a20 ON a20.id = b.area_com_id
LEFT JOIN sys_area a21 ON a21.id = b.area_grid_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ccm_house_psychogeny a LEFT JOIN ccm_people b ON a.people_id = b.id
a.people_id = #{id} and a.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_house_psychogeny( id, people_id, economic, allowance, guar_iden, guar_name, guar_tel, dateonset, diag_type, atte_type, acci_hist, acci_count, acci_last, dang_asse, trea_cond, hospital, hosp_reason, trai_inst, management, helpcase, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{peopleId}, #{economic}, #{allowance}, #{guarIden}, #{guarName}, #{guarTel}, #{dateonset}, #{diagType}, #{atteType}, #{acciHist}, #{acciCount}, #{acciLast}, #{dangAsse}, #{treaCond}, #{hospital}, #{hospReason}, #{traiInst}, #{management}, #{helpcase}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_house_psychogeny SET people_id = #{peopleId}, economic = #{economic}, allowance = #{allowance}, guar_iden = #{guarIden}, guar_name = #{guarName}, guar_tel = #{guarTel}, dateonset = #{dateonset}, diag_type = #{diagType}, atte_type = #{atteType}, acci_hist = #{acciHist}, acci_count = #{acciCount}, acci_last = #{acciLast}, dang_asse = #{dangAsse}, trea_cond = #{treaCond}, hospital = #{hospital}, hosp_reason = #{hospReason}, trai_inst = #{traiInst}, management = #{management}, helpcase = #{helpcase}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
